title: Chuunibyou demo Koi ga Shitai! OVA
alternative_title: 中二病でも恋がしたい! 煌めきの... 聖爆誕祭（スラップステック・ノエル）
description: Yuuta Togashi suffered from chuunibyou while he was in middle school. When he graduated, he put that dark history behind him and forgot about it... or he was supposed to. High school was smooth sailing and full of enjoyment - until the unavoidable, sad event occurs. The event that locks Yuuta into a contract with Rikka Takanashi and disrupts his desperately ordinary life. Adapted from the back of the first novel.
